post_title: I am interested in the MA Digital Games program at CGL. I need some help on the requirements

comments.author: a2800276
comments.body:
>Â But what kind of CV are we talking about here? Like professional work history in game development or anything related?


Is there any other kind? A CV is just a short summary of your life with emphasis on your education and career. If you have not completed your studies no one will expect much from the professional experience part, pad that bit out with any relevant side jobs, internships, open source projects, etc

comments.author: KingOfConstipation
comments.body: I can def add some open source projects for sure! Thank you!
